data: {"generalSituation":"A replenishment of the northeast monsoon will reach the coast of Guangdong tomorrow morning. It will be windier on Monday and at first on Tuesday, and temperatures will fall slightly. With the monsoon moderating, temperatures over the region will rise midweek next week. Under the influence of another dry replenishment of the monsoon, temperatures over the coast of southern China will fall again during Christmas holidays. It will be cool in the morning and at night over the region. The weather will improve and it will be dry over the coastal areas of Guangdong during the next weekend. The temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over inland areas.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251221","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3 to 4, occasionally force 5 offshore and on high ground later.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine and dry.
